column2: an A.M. Eatery////Fantastic breakfast option in the 024
column3: new location at Beltway 8 and Memorial.  Our server the last 2 trips has been fantastic
column6: friendly and most of all loves what he does and the product he serves.  We always get a pancake for the table to share
column8: we tried the sweet potato (5/5) and cinnamon roll (4/5) pancakes.  Legend goes the syrup is $100/bottle
column10: sure tastes like it!  I always get the puff pastry with gravy and egg
column12: nice hint of rosemary 4.5/5.  It's a cool place
column13: and great alternative to the usual boring breakfast places.  Pro tip: arrive before 9am to avoid a wait.
